topicTitle: The Case of the Missing Points

posts.postText:
I logged on last night, having not joined for a couple weeks. After a few rounds, I check my point total to discover I had a WHOPPING 17 points.

What I wanna know is how I went from 800-some points to 17. ._.
I'm afraid I don't know the exact number of how many I had before, I just remember being 100-200 points away from Adv Disguiser.

I believe the problem may be rooted in the server issues that occurred recently. I guess there's nothing that can be done about it, it just sucks so I'm kinda ranting. Hopefully it doesn't happen to anyone else. Ever. :P
happens to me alot, but leaving and rejoining usually fixes it
My points better not be missing. I owe like over 60 points to winners in my lottery...
Try rejoining, or maybe you forgot you spent them on something? Points don't disappear like that, it was probably just a glitch that made it say the wrong number...? Or something. :P

I've tried reconnecting several times, but they never came back.
Not only that, but they reset again.
And I'm pretty sure I didn't buy anything while I was away from TTT for a couple weeks. :P
I'm going to try logging on again, maybe by some miracle they've come back...
---
/edit:
Nope, they're still gone. I only have the 101 points I earned while playing the other day.
